sentences.pinyin: tā xiǎng yánshēn tā de lǚchéng.
sentences.translation: He wants to extend his journey.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于新的合同条件，公司决定延伸他们的业务到国外。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於新的合同條件，公司決定延伸他們的業務到國外。
sentences.pinyin: yóuyú xīn de hétóng tiáojiàn, gōngsī juédìng yánshēn tāmen de yèwù dào guówài.
sentences.translation: Due to the new contract conditions, the company decided to extend their business abroad.
